skills.skill: Siemens and Allen Bradley PLC software programming
HMI programming at machine control level

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and implement machine controls systems for automation equipment.
Collaborate with and support other engineers to ensure successful design integration and functionality.
Improve performance and reduce downtime on presses, furnaces, manipulators, and CNC machines through control system optimization.
Assist with implementation of annual shutdowns for maintenance purposes.
Document and maintain specifications for new equipment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering and experience working in the field of manufacturing automation or similar.
